scripts.dev:db: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('.db',{recursive:true})" && cross-env DATABASE_URL="file:./.db/dev.db" prisma generate --schema prisma/test/schema.prisma && cross-env DATABASE_URL="file:./.db/dev.db" prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/test/schema.prisma
scripts.test:setup: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('.db',{recursive:true})" && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL="file:./.db/test.db" prisma generate --schema prisma/test/schema.prisma && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL="file:./.db/test.db" prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/test/schema.prisma
